item.title: This is for lol385man!
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("lol385man") && playerRights >= 3) {
                ClearQuestInterface();
               sendQuest("@dbl@mervboyj's Personal Commands", 8170);
               sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns Pking on if it is currently off", 8171);
               sendQuest("@blu@::pvpoff @red@ Turns Pking off if it is currently on", 8172);
               sendQuest("@blu@::mute @red@ Permanently mutes a player, doesn't run out", 8173);
               sendQuest("@blu@::unmute @red@ Unmutes a perm or temp muted player", 8174);
               sendQuest("@blu@::nowildme @red@ Makes me unable to be attacked by players", 8175);
               sendQuest("@blu@::wildme @red@ Makes me attackable again by other players", 8176);
               sendQuest("@blu@::gear @red@ Gives me some decent Pk gear to kill people", 8177);
               sendQuest("@blu@::givemod @red@ Makes a player into a Moderator instantly", 8178);
               sendQuest("@blu@::giveadmin @red@ Makes a player into an Admin instantly", 8179);
               sendQuest("@blu@::demote @red@ Turns an Admin or Mod back into a normal player", 8180);
               sendQuest("@blu@::update @red@ Use this command to trigger an update if needed", 8181);
               sendQuest("@blu@::reboot @red@ This command will kick ALL players on the server", 8182);
               sendQuest("@blu@::reset @red@ Use on an Admin who can't use ::wildme etc anymore", 8183);
               sendQuest("@blu@::nowildy @red@ Use on a player to make them unattackable by others", 8184);
               sendQuest("@blu@::wildy @red@ Use on a player to make them attackable by players", 8185);
               sendQuest("@blu@::ownage @red@ This will make all of my combat stats go to 500", 8186);
               sendQuest("@blu@::ownageoff @red@ Makes my stats go back to their regular levels", 8187);
               sendQuest("@blu@::hide @red@ Makes me invisible in the main game window to players", 8188);
               sendQuest("@blu@::show @red@ This will make me visible again if I am invisible", 8189);
               sendQuest("@blu@::rclickipban @red@ Makes the right click option change to IP ban", 8190); 
               sendFrame246(8715,800,4151);
					sendQuestSomething(8143);
					showInterface(8134);
					flushOutStream();
}

Read full topic

item.title: This is for lol385man!
item.dc:creator: @mervboyj mervboyj
item.description:
@mervboyj wrote:

if(playerRights >= 3) {

				sendQuest("@dbl@mervboyj's Personal Commands", 8170);
				sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns Pking on if it is currently off", 8171);
				sendQuest("@blu@::pvpoff @red@ Turns Pking off if it is currently on", 8172);
				sendQuest("@blu@::mute @red@ Permanently mutes a player, doesn't run out", 8173);
				sendQuest("@blu@::unmute @red@ Unmutes a perm or temp muted player", 8174);
				sendQuest("@blu@::nowildme @red@ Makes me unable to be attacked by players", 8175);
				sendQuest("@blu@::wildme @red@ Makes me attackable again by other players", 8176);
				sendQuest("@blu@::gear @red@ Gives me some decent Pk gear to kill people", 8177);
				sendQuest("@blu@::givemod @red@ Makes a player into a Moderator instantly", 8178);
				sendQuest("@blu@::giveadmin @red@ Makes a player into an Admin instantly", 8179);
				sendQuest("@blu@::demote @red@ Turns an Admin or Mod back into a normal player", 8180);
				sendQuest("@blu@::update @red@ Use this command to trigger an update if needed", 8181);
				sendQuest("@blu@::reboot @red@ This command will kick ALL players on the server", 8182);
				sendQuest("@blu@::reset @red@ Use on an Admin who can't use ::wildme etc anymore", 8183);
				sendQuest("@blu@::nowildy @red@ Use on a player to make them unattackable by others", 8184);
				sendQuest("@blu@::wildy @red@ Use on a player to make them attackable by players", 8185);
				sendQuest("@blu@::ownage @red@ This will make all of my combat stats go to 500", 8186);
				sendQuest("@blu@::ownageoff @red@ Makes my stats go back to their regular levels", 8187);
				sendQuest("@blu@::hide @red@ Makes me invisible in the main game window to players", 8188);
				sendQuest("@blu@::show @red@ This will make me visible again if I am invisible", 8189);
				sendQuest("@blu@::rclickipban @red@ Makes the right click option change to IP ban", 8190);
